DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research investigate efficacy transplant screen donor fecal material treat patient recurrent Clostridium difficile infection . Participants refractory Clostridium difficile infection give healthy donor stool administer colonoscopy enema response evaluate symptom questionnaire stool test Clostridium difficile 4 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Fecal Microbiota Transplant Recurrent Clostridium Difficile Infection
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Recipient : Between age 18 100 Have positive Clostridium difficile polymerase chain reaction ( PCR ) toxin Have symptoms > 3 watery loose stool day least 2 consecutive day Have fail least one prior standard course antibiotic therapy . Examples standard therapy : Metronidazole 500 mg three time day 10 14 day Vancomycin 125 mg four time day 10 14 day Not pregnant negative urine and/or serum human chorionic gonadotropin ( hCG ) test Not take oral intravenous steroid past three month . Not biologic agent , antitumor necrosis factor ( antiTNF ) agent , cyclosporine , mercaptopurine , azathioprine , methotrexate chemotherapy precede 3 month Not profound immunosuppression : Chemotherapy precede 3 month , HIV/AIDS , decompensated cirrhosis Not Intensive Care Unit Not transplant recipient Exclusion Criteria Recipient : Not age 18 100 Does positive Clostridium difficile PCR toxin Does symptoms > 3 watery loose stool day least 2 consecutive day Has fail least one prior standard course antibiotic therapy .
